hadiths.text: Abd al-Rahman b. al-Aswad reported on the authority of his father:I asked 'A'isha about incantation. She said: Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) had granted its sanction to the members of a family of the Ansar for incantation in curing every type of poison

chapter.ara-name: باب اسْتِحْبَابِ الرُّقْيَةِ مِنَ الْعَيْنِ وَالنَّمْلَةِ وَالْحُمَةِ وَالنَّظْرَةِ
chapter.eng-name: It Is Recommended To Recite Ruqyah For The Evil Eye, Pustules, And Stings
